text: Fields will be purchased with silver, and deeds will be signed, sealed, and witnessed in the land of Benjamin, in the areas surrounding Jerusalem, and in the cities of Judah—the cities of the hill country, the foothills,32:44 Hebrew Shephelah or lowlands; that is, the western foothills of Judea and the Negev—because I will restore them from captivity,32:44 Or restore their fortunes declares the LORD.”
